languages.text: "Проктор-проктор... Такой суровый и неприступный на вид, а оказался не таким суровым и весьма приступным на деле!"
"Ah, our good Proctor... He always seemed to me so stern and unapproachable — but in truth, he was not nearly so stern, and indeed quite approachable after all!"
languages.original_text: "Проктор-проктор... Такой суровый и неприступный на вид, а оказался не таким суровым и весьма приступным на деле!"

traits.locale_text: "Ah, our good Proctor... I thought he seemed so stern and unapproachable — but in truth, he was not nearly as stern and quite approachable after all!"
"Ah, our good Proctor... I thought he seemed so stern and unapproachable — but in truth, he was not nearly as stern and quite approachable after all!"
"Ah, our good Proctor... He always seemed to me so stern and unapproachable — but in truth, he was not nearly so stern, and indeed quite approachable after all!"
"Ah, our good Proctor... He always seemed to me so stern and unapproachable — but in truth, he was not nearly so stern, and indeed quite approachable after all!"
"Ah, our good Proctor... He always seemed to me so stern and unapproachable — but in truth, he was not nearly so stern, and indeed quite approachable after all!"
"Ah, our good Proctor... He always seemed to me so stern and unapproachable — but in truth, he was not nearly so stern, and indeed quite approachable after all!"

languages.text: 「ああ、我らが良き代理人さん…彼はいつも厳格で近寄りがたいように思ったけど、実際はそれほど厳しくなく、むしろかなり親しみやすかったわ！」
languages.original_text: "Ah, our good Proctor... He always seemed to me so stern and unapproachable — but in truth, he was not nearly so stern, and indeed quite approachable after all!"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、我らが良き代理人さん…彼はいつも厳格で近寄りがたいように思ったけど、実際はそれほど厳しくなく、むしろかなり親しみやすかったわ！」

languages.text: "Ah, unser guter Proktor ... Er wirkte immer so ernst und unnahbar – aber in Wahrheit war er gar nicht so ernst und ist eigentlich sogar ziemlich nahbar!"
languages.original_text: "Ah, our good Proctor... He always seemed to me so stern and unapproachable — but in truth, he was not nearly so stern, and indeed quite approachable after all!"

traits.locale_text: "Ah, unser guter Proktor ... Er wirkte immer so ernst und unnahbar – aber in Wahrheit war er gar nicht so ernst und ist eigentlich sogar ziemlich nahbar!"

languages.text: «Ah, el buen Procurador... siempre parecía tan estricto e inalcanzable... pero en realidad no es tan estricto como parece, ¡y ha resultado ser alcanzable!».
languages.original_text: "Ah, our good Proctor... He always seemed to me so stern and unapproachable — but in truth, he was not nearly so stern, and indeed quite approachable after all!"

traits.locale_text: «Ah, el buen Procurador... siempre parecía tan estricto e inalcanzable... pero en realidad no es tan estricto como parece, ¡y ha resultado ser alcanzable!».

languages.text: “啊，我们这位了不起的监察官……在我看来，他总是那么严肃、那么难以接近，但实际上，他根本没那么严肃，还挺平易近人的！”
languages.original_text: "Ah, our good Proctor... He always seemed to me so stern and unapproachable — but in truth, he was not nearly so stern, and indeed quite approachable after all!"

traits.locale_text: “啊，我们这位了不起的监察官……在我看来，他总是那么严肃、那么难以接近，但实际上，他根本没那么严肃，还挺平易近人的！”

languages.text: "Ah, güzelim Üsteğmenimiz... Bana hep çok sert ve ulaşılması güç biri gibi gelirdi ama hiç de öyle sert değil, gayet de ulaşılabilirmiş meğer!"
languages.original_text: "Ah, our good Proctor... He always seemed to me so stern and unapproachable — but in truth, he was not nearly so stern, and indeed quite approachable after all!"

traits.locale_text: "Ah, güzelim Üsteğmen'imiz... Bana hep çok sert ve ulaşılması güç biri gibi gelirdi ama hiç de öyle sert değil, gayet de ulaşılabilirmiş meğer!"

languages.original_text: "Ah, our good Proctor... He always seemed to me so stern and unapproachable — but in truth, he was not nearly so stern, and indeed quite approachable after all!"

languages.text: « Ah, notre bon proctor... Il m'a toujours semblé si sévère et distant... mais en vérité, il n'était pas si sévère et s'est même révélé très accessible finalement ! »
languages.original_text: "Ah, our good Proctor... He always seemed to me so stern and unapproachable — but in truth, he was not nearly so stern, and indeed quite approachable after all!"

traits.locale_text: « Ah, notre bon proctor... Il m'a toujours semblé si sévère et distant... mais en vérité, il n'était pas si sévère et s'est même révélé très accessible finalement ! »
